imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings

Class Mapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.Mapping
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BilinearMapping, LinearMapping, RippleMapping, SphereMapping, TwirlMapping

    public abstract class Mapping
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Abstract class which represents a general 2D transformation.
    Version:
    2019/01/01

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mapping() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] applyTo(double[] xy)
      Applies this transformation to a 2D point given as a double array.
      abstract double[] applyTo(double x, double y)
      Applies this transformation to the given 2D point.
      Point2D applyTo(Point2D pnt)
      Applies this mapping to a single 2D point.
      Point2D[] applyTo(Point2D[] pnts)
      Applies this mapping to all points in the array of 2D points (convenience method).
      Mapping duplicate()
      Duplicates this mapping by using Object's shallow clone method.
      Mapping getInverse()
      The inverse of this mapping is calculated (if possible) and returned.

        public Mapping()

    • Method Detail

      • duplicate

        public Mapping duplicate()
        Duplicates this mapping by using Object's shallow clone method. Sub-classes are supposed to override this method.
        Returns:
        a copy of this mapping

      • applyTo

        public abstract double[] applyTo(double x,
                                 double y)
        Applies this transformation to the given 2D point. All sub-classes of Mapping must implement this method.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the point to be mapped
        y - the y-coordinate of the point to be mapped
        Returns:
        the transformed 2D coordinate

      • applyTo

        public double[] applyTo(double[] xy)
        Applies this transformation to a 2D point given as a double array.
        Parameters:
        xy - the point to be mapped
        Returns:
        the transformed 2D coordinate

      • getInverse

        public Mapping getInverse()
        The inverse of this mapping is calculated (if possible) and returned.
        Returns:
        the inverse mapping

      • applyTo

        public Point2D applyTo(Point2D pnt)
        Applies this mapping to a single 2D point.
        Parameters:
        pnt - the original point
        Returns:
        the transformed point

      • applyTo

        public Point2D[] applyTo(Point2D[] pnts)
        Applies this mapping to all points in the array of 2D points (convenience method).
        Parameters:
        pnts - the original points
        Returns:
        the transformed points
